title: The Intimacy of the Relation between Space & Time, Order & Chaos, The Incomplete & The Continuous
description:
Another rich conversation with Matthew Dean Allison, philosopher and writer with an incredibly fertile mind. He asked me to detail my progress so far in Wolfram's Theory of Everything and then we riff off of that as well as considering Matthieu Pageau's interpretation of Space and Time. We wonder also about "place" and "context"

 Our original intention was to talk about Saul Kripke's book Naming and Necessity but that will have to wait for a future episode.

Wolfram's Theory update 10/19/21:  https://youtu.be/Sr6CmIzF6u0
Karen and Michael discuss Wolfram's theory in this video where all of the visual illustrations are included in the first few minutes:  https://youtu.be/SzUEzVZiAoo
